## NEURAL NETWORK FROM SCRATCH ##

This project is a Neural Network using numpy and math,the neural network will be trained and tested using the Dataset of handwritten-digits of MNIST.

### DATASETS

Downloaded from: https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/oddrationale/mnist-in-csv 

### INSTALATION

```bash

1. Clone the Repository:

git clone https://github.com/NvirAdan/Neural-Network-From-Scratch.git

2. Enter the folder

cd "Neural Network From Scratch"

3. Create a Virtual Environment(Optional)(Recommended)

Windows:
python -m venv venv

Linux/MacOS:
python3 -m venv venv

4. Initiate The Virtual Environment

Windows:
./venv/Scripts/Activate

Linux/MacOS:
source venv/bin/activate

5.Install The libraries

pip install -r requirements.txt

6. Iniciate Jupyter Notebook

jupyter notebook
